name: Football Penalty Strike 2018
description:
Football Penalty Strike 2018 is the flick shoot 3d football game where you try to score goal with flick of your finger. Soccer star flick shoot world cup has started, choose your favourite team or player and become the part of the kick shootout tournament. Score against the world's top football strike team in amazing flick soccer hero game. World cup kick shoot game has three modes: career mode, challenge mode and practice mode. You can buy different power ups to enhance your football flick shoot 3d experience. Shoot with full power and enjoy the fun of scoring goals as penalty kicker and save score as goal keeper.

Football penalty strike, Can you make a powerful football kick? Can you save the goal? If yes then play penalty and free kick football game as one of the best sports game in the world. Be the flick shoot penalty kick hero and win the world cup or penalty league with your amazing soccer hero score skills. New authentic football strike physics base penalty kick game will put you in the role of football kicker and goal keeper for a soccer star shootout tournament.

How to Play:
• Swipe your finger across the screen to kick
• Use right/left arrow button to stop the kick

Football Penalty Strike 2018 FEATURES:
• Extremely realistic ball physics
• Easy and intuitive controls: swipe and flick
• Beat countless soccer league challenges
• Play as the kicker or the defender
• Kick right through the defense and score the goal
• Become a star with your favorite national team
• Manage your player through an epic career
• Play in tournaments all around the world
• Win the world cup and become a football star

If you like our Football Penalty Strike game then try out other sports games by clicking on more from developer. Do not forget to rate and review.
